original_title: Live From The Bud Light x Lady Gaga Dive Bar Tour: New York
overview: The Dive Bar Tour is the mini-tour by Lady Gaga, in support of her fifth studio album, Joanne. The tour was sponsored by Bud Light. The tour visited three dive bars in the United States in Nashville, New York and Las Vegas, on October 5, 20 and 27. The three shows of the tour were aired across three nights on Bud Light's Facebook page, as well as Gaga's.
title: Live From The Bud Light x Lady Gaga Dive Bar Tour: New York
